content: sts single_crochet dee in next 2 sts tum - 12 sts row 18 chain i single_crochet dee in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 8 sts single_crochet dee in next 2 sts turn - 10 sts row 19 chain 1 single_crochet dee in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 6 sts single_crochet dee in next 2 sts - 8 sts row 20 chain 1 place marker on this st single_crochet dee in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 2 sts chain 15 t his will be the hanging loop add or subtract chains to make it smaller or bigger single_crochet next 2 sts single_crochet sec in last 2 sts - 6 sts 4 of 5 round 21 join in the round again single_crochet in the stitch with stitch marker in it single_crochet dee in next 2 sts twice single_crochet in next st - 4 sts cut yarn and tie off weave in your ends join yarn at the top point of the mouth and single_crochet at evenly as possible around the mouth slip_stitch to the first stitch of this round cut yarn tie off and weave in ends tentacles step 1 cut 24 strands of yarn roughly to 3 to 4 inches long step 2 insert crochet hook upward through one of the front loops not used in row 5 step 3 fold strand of yarn in half roughly then grab the middle with your hook and pull it through part way step 4 grab both tails with hook or fingers whichever is easier for you and pull through loop step 5 gently pull to tighten repeat step 2-5 with each strand of yarn and each front loop around the body 5 of 5 eyes and antennae the antennae i used pipe cleaners i cut a 6 inch piece of pipe cleaner i inserted on end through to the other side near the loop i shaped it and used fabric glue underneath to stick it into place the eyes i used small pompoms the white pompom is 12 7mm and the black pompom is 5mm i glued the black pompom onto the white using fabric glue again then once dry enough i used fabric glue to attach the eyes to the yip yip o ~ f eyes - make 2 with 2 5 mm hook and white yarn with 8mm safety eyes 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 -4 single_crochet around 12 6 scdec * 6 insert safety eyes into the centre of magic_ring stuff the eye & fo leaving yarn tail for closing hole and sewing onto head these eyes have not been tested yet it is an alternative to the pompoms if y ou wanted to try them out
